channel.title: CVE Feed for webtoffee -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webtoffee -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3162|2024-10-01T18:01:13.516Z -- webtoffee -- stripe%20payment%20plugin%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Stripe Payment Plugin for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 3.7.7. This is due to insufficient verification on the user being supplied during a Stripe checkout through the plugin. This allows unauthenticated attackers to log in as users who have orders, who are typically customers.

item.title: CVE-2024-32834|2024-08-02T02:20:35.620Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20shipping%20label
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebToffee WooCommerce Shipping Label allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WooCommerce Shipping Label: from n/a through 2.3.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34751|2024-08-02T02:59:21.875Z -- webtoffee -- order%20export%20%26%20order%20import%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce.This issue affects Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-32835|2024-08-02T02:20:35.671Z -- webtoffee -- import%20export%20wordpress%20users
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Import Export WordPress Users.This issue affects Import Export WordPress Users: from n/a through 2.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31254|2024-07-08T18:32:45.226Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Backup & Migration.This issue affects WordPress Backup & Migration: from n/a through 1.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-52183|2024-06-11T14:54:39.001Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Backup & Migration.This issue affects WordPress Backup & Migration: from n/a through 1.4.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-51546|2024-05-17T08:44:58.426Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%2C%20delivery%20notes%20and%20shipping%20labels
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WebToffee WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels: from n/a through 4.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32835|2024-06-04T17:51:27.558Z -- webtoffee -- import%20export%20wordpress%20users
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Import Export WordPress Users.This issue affects Import Export WordPress Users: from n/a through 2.5.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebToffee WooCommerce Shipping Label allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WooCommerce Shipping Label: from n/a through 2.3.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34751|2024-06-04T17:41:06.524Z -- webtoffee -- order%20export%20%26%20order%20import%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WebToffee Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce.This issue affects Order Export & Order Import for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.4.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-31254|2024-04-10T15:45:11.886Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Backup & Migration.This issue affects WordPress Backup & Migration: from n/a through 1.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-31235|2024-04-12T13:01:53.767Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20comments%20import%20%26%20export
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Comments Import & Export.This issue affects WordPress Comments Import & Export: from n/a through 2.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-3546|2024-06-06T19:20:08.771Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: The WordPress Backup & Migration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wp_mgdp_populate_popup function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or above, to invoke this function and access log files maintained by the plugin. Additionally, the file name is user-provided and not properly sanitized, which allows attackers to read arbitrary log files on the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3216|2024-04-06T03:24:44.171Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%2C%20delivery%20notes%20and%20shipping%20labels
item.description: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the wt_pklist_reset_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset all of the plugin's settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-31235|2024-07-03T13:19:08.733Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20comments%20import%20%26%20export
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebToffee WordPress Comments Import & Export.This issue affects WordPress Comments Import & Export: from n/a through 2.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-51546|2024-07-25T13:37:10.837Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%2C%20delivery%20notes%20and%20shipping%20labels

item.title: CVE-2024-3216|2024-08-01T20:05:08.295Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%2C%20delivery%20notes%20and%20shipping%20labels
item.description: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the wt_pklist_reset_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset all of the plugin's settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-3546|2024-08-01T20:12:07.631Z -- webtoffee -- wordpress%20backup%20%26%20migration
item.description: The WordPress Backup & Migration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the wp_mgdp_populate_popup function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or above, to invoke this function and access log files maintained by the plugin. Additionally, the file name is user-provided and not properly sanitized, which allows attackers to read arbitrary log files on the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3216|2024-08-08T19:49:21.881Z -- webtoffee -- woocommerce%20pdf%20invoices%2C%20packing%20slips%2C%20delivery%20notes%20and%20shipping%20labels
item.description: The WooCommerce PDF Invoices, Packing Slips, Delivery Notes and Shipping Labels plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the wt_pklist_reset_settings() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to reset all of the plugin's settings.
